name: SuperSquareHole
description:
SuperSquareHole : A box.

Dev build. Help support development by chipping in a buck, or check it out for free.

Curve-defying platform exploration, featuring :

  • Mind-bending squareness.
  • Keyboard and gamepad support.
  • Interminable branching and looping level structure.
  • Fixed FPS.
  • RPG-lite-like powerups, pets, and snark.
  • Secrets (spoiler mode available).
  • Certifiable boss-style challenges.
  • More secrets.
  • Fun™ (experience may vary).
  • No rounds.

Comments and updates : @EYEWAREi
